content.raw:
A little more context. There are two timers going on here. One timer is the qt event loop, and the other timer is the Camera render rate. In order to meet the Camera render rate, we have to run the qt event loop much faster. For this pull request, I multiplied the camera render rate by 4 to get closer to the Camera render rate.

I'm making a different pull request to default that will eliminate the UserCamera render rate timer.
content.html:
A little more context. There are two timers going on here. One timer is the qt event loop, and the other timer is the Camera render rate. In order to meet the Camera render rate, we have to run the qt event loop much faster. For this pull request, I multiplied the camera render rate by 4 to get closer to the Camera render rate.

I'm making a different pull request to default that will eliminate the UserCamera render rate timer.
